total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grid that is being mirrored in the output grid.
Q2: Determine the direction of the mirroring (vertical or horizontal).
Q3: Identify the elements that are being mirrored.
Q4: Determine if there are any changes in the mirrored elements (color or number changes).
Q5: Apply the mirroring pattern to the quiz input grid.
Q6: Apply any changes to the mirrored elements in the quiz input grid to generate the output grid.
Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grid that is being mirrored in the output grid.
Q2: Determine the direction of the mirroring (vertical or horizontal).
Q3: Identify the elements in the input grid that are being mirrored in the output grid.
Q4: Determine the position of the mirrored elements in the output grid.
Q5: Identify any changes in the mirrored elements (color, size, shape, etc.).
Q6: Apply the identified pattern, direction, position, and changes to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
